title: Web Werks Unveils Its Wide Range of Cloud Hosting Platform
text:
Web Werks Unveils Its Wide Range of Cloud Hosting Platform
Web Werks now offers various cloud plans including static, customized, managed and unmanaged cloud, designed to match the varying needs of modern businesses.
Mumbai, India, August 26, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Web Werks, India’s fastest growing data center services provider, has rolled out a mixed bag of Cloud hosting services including CloudVPS, RapidvCloud with SATA, SAS & SSD flavors and fully redundant Microsoft’s Azure Cloud platform. They will also provide customized solutions where the cloud offerings will be custom-made according to the customer’s need. The cloud plans are tailored to meet the clients’ budget as well as their expectations.
Nikhil Rathi, CEO/MD at Web Werks data centers commented “The time is here that we need to think for our business differently because there is a shift in customers’ decision making patterns. Earlier, customers were reluctant in adopting new things but today they readily embrace innovative technologies. In fact, they look out for the providers who can offer them the latest and innovative solutions. Keeping the changing trends in mind, we have introduced new variations in our cloud offerings.”
Web Werks also offers private cloud plans to customers with enterprise hosting requirements. Besides, they have assorted their cloud offerings as managed and unmanaged backup service options.
“We are a team of seasoned professionals who have been functioning in the data center market since two decades. We have contributed significantly in the industry growth and our industry experts can perfectly understand the market pulse. On their proposition, we have brought in multiple cloud options to our product range. The idea behind these cloud assortments is to help the businesses of all sizes, of any industry in attaining their data computing needs. Our business objectives drive us to reinvent solutions that match our brand image and strengthen our market positioning,” said Nishant Rathi, CEO/MD at WebWerks.
Web Werks has a huge client base of 55000+ customers across the world including several Fortune 500 companies. They have come up with innovative Cloud plans to help their clients attain the data excellence and achieve improved business results.
